    • Method Detail

      • performAccess

        public boolean performAccess(IConditionType condType,
                             SAPTimestamp accessTimeStamp,
                             IAccess access,
                             IPricingItemUserExit prItem,
                             char[] releaseStatus,
                             java.util.List resultRecordIds)
        Description copied from interface: IPricingConditionAccessFormula
        performs condition records access for given condition type, access step combination
        Specified by:
        performAccess in interface IPricingConditionAccessFormula
        Parameters:
        condType - pricing condition type
        accessTimeStamp - access time stamp for condition access
        access - access step information
        prItem - pricing item
        releaseStatus - target condition record release statuses (for example released or released for simulation etc)
        resultRecordIds - result of condition record access. List of condition record IDs (varnumh field)
        Returns:
        should be set to TRUE if access is performed from this method. Otherwise set it to FALSE. If it is set TRUE then it indicates that logic inside formula is really performed. If it is set to false, default condition access mechanism of IPC will be used
